title: 【國際交流活動】日本藥科大學 2025 NPU Winter Program
department: 國際事務處國際學生組

author.department: 國際事務處國際學生組
author.name: 呂姿穎

content:
分類： 活動公告
來源： 國際事務處國際學生組 - 呂姿穎 - doris@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話5173
對象： 全校學生
標題： 【國際交流活動】日本藥科大學 2025 NPU Winter Program
日期： Fri, 25 Oct 2024 17:05:49 +0800

English version in below

◎時間：2025年02月03日 – 2025年02月07日

◎地點：日本藥科大學 御茶水校區

◎費用：15,000 日幣，現金支付（不包含住宿、餐費、機票、保險、交通費及其他個人花費）

◎報名截止時間：2024.11.30

◎報名流程

1.填寫google 表單向國際處報名，同時繳交以下文件：

Google form：https://reurl.cc/2jAzQ9

*在學證明
*家長同意書 

2.自行到姊妹校提供之連結報名: https://forms.office.com/r/9qLVyA6Z3z

3.等待姐妹校通知。

課程內容包含：

1. Lectures of Japanese pharmaceuticals and healthcare,
2. Inter-activities with NPU students,
3. Practice of Japanese traditional medicine,
4. Experience some local cultures.

地址:  3-15-9 Yushima, Bunkyo-ku, Tokyo 113-0034, Japan (〒113-0034 東京都文京区湯島3丁目15-9).
(https://maps.app.goo.gl/DpvPZfiYAkeNSSxD6)

注意事項：

1. 證書將會在完成課程之後製作給參加者。
2. 國際處僅公告或協助本校學生報名參加簽約校的短期活動或課程，其短期課程是否可抵免本校學分，參加學生需遵照教務處相關規定辦理。若活動日期為本校學期上課期間，學生須依照本校規定自行辦理請假手續。

English version

◎Period： February 3~ February 7 , 2025

◎Location：Nihon Pharmaceutical University Ochanomizu Campus , Japan

◎Fee：15,000 JPY, pay by cash at your arrival in NPU.

（Not included in this fee are accommodation, meals, airfare, traveler’s insurance, transportation and daily expenses. ）

◎Registration Deadline：2024.11.30

1.Sign up via google form and upload below documents to OIA.

Google form：https://reurl.cc/2jAzQ9

*Student Status Certificate
*Parental Consent Letter

2. Complete application at : https://forms.gle/xToy9zLCWFrfgsJ6A

3. Await the announcement from NPU.

Comprising following subjects:

1. Lectures of Japanese pharmaceuticals and healthcare,
2. Inter-activities with NPU students,
3. Practice of Japanese traditional medicine,
4. Experience some local cultures.

Address: 3-15-9 Yushima, Bunkyo-ku, Tokyo 113-0034, Japan (〒113-0034 東京都文京区湯島3丁目15-9).
(https://maps.app.goo.gl/DpvPZfiYAkeNSSxD6)

Please note:

1. The Certificate of Completion (COC) will be issued to all participants.
2. The OIA only announces or assists our school’s students in registering for short-term activities or courses offered by contracted schools. Whether credits from these short-term courses can be transferred to our school is subject to the regulations of the Academic Affairs Office, and participating students must comply accordingly. If the activity falls within our school’s academic semester, students must follow our school’s regulations to apply for leave of absence.
